page.description: Appends lines (adding needed CR-LFs) eliminates blank lines.

argument.name: Result_List
argument.description: The CR-LF delimited list produced by *CONCAT_LINES().

argument.name: lines1
argument.description: The character string that will receive the addition.

argument.name: Lines2
argument.description: The character string to add to Line1. Optional. More character strings to add to Line1.

page.discussion: The *CONCAT_LINES() appends lines to list, adding CR-LF delimiters, and eliminating blank lines. *CONCAT_LINES() is much faster than string addition.
page.example: dim ff as C ff = *concat_lines(ff, "line1") ff = *concat_lines(ff, "line2") ff = *concat_lines(ff, "") ff = *concat_lines(ff, "line4") ? ff = line1 line2 line4
